statements: DELETE FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 2002 AND error_code = 404;
DELETE FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE error_code = 404 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 1002 AND anomaly_description LIKE '%error%' AND timestamp >= '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND anomaly_code = 'ERR001';
DELETE FROM error_codes WHERE error_severity > 3 AND error_description LIKE '%critical%';
DELETE FROM SensorErrorLogs WHERE sensor_id = 200 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
